trans-unit.source: Crops a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 裁剪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只有在物件初始設定期間發生屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始設定。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> objects created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and properties cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> 使用所建立的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>建構函式會自動初始化，且無法變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果映像儲存到檔案後套用轉換，則必須更新映像資料相關的中繼資料標記。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A> property of this class to define the area of the bitmap that is to be cropped.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>屬性的這個類別，以定義要裁剪之點陣圖的區域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> 使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29> to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29>初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 於 <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 初始化開始。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必須之間進行屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>與一組屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 目前正在起始。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已經呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 已經完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap" /> 初始化結束。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必須之間進行屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>與一組屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit" /> method is called without first calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.EndInit" /> 方法在未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.BeginInit" /> 的情況下先行呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖的來源。

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖來源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> to the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將鏈結<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>到另一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>適當<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about chaining, see [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需鏈結的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 鏈結 BitmapSource 物件一起](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-chain-bitmapsource-objects-together.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.Source" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖將裁剪成的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area that the bitmap is cropped to.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖將裁剪成的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap> with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will render the entire image.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap>與<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>整個影像。

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that is not fully within the bounds of the bitmap will not render.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖的範圍內是不完全的矩形將不會呈現。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CroppedBitmap.SourceRect" /> 相依性屬性。
